remarks: Lemma for ~ psgnuni .  Induction step for moving a transposition as far to the right as possible.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2016.)
statement:
psgnunilem2.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
psgnunilem2.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) $.
psgnunilem2.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. V ) $.
psgnunilem2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. Word T ) $.
psgnunilem2.id $e |- ( ph -> ( G gsum W ) = ( _I |` D ) ) $.
psgnunilem2.l $e |- ( ph -> ( # ` W ) = L ) $.
psgnunilem2.ix $e |- ( ph -> I e. ( 0 ..^ L ) ) $.
psgnunilem2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. dom ( ( W ` I ) \ _I ) ) $.
psgnunilem2.al $e |- ( ph -> A. k e. ( 0 ..^ I ) -. A e. dom ( ( W ` k ) \ _I ) ) $.
psgnunilem2.in $e |- ( ph -> -. E. x e. Word T ( ( # ` x ) = ( L - 2 ) /\ ( G gsum x ) = ( _I |` D ) ) ) $.
psgnunilem2 $p |- ( ph -> E. w e. Word T ( ( ( G gsum w ) = ( _I |` D ) /\ ( # ` w ) = L ) /\ ( ( I + 1 ) e. ( 0 ..^ L ) /\ A e. dom ( ( w ` ( I + 1 ) ) \ _I ) /\ A. j e. ( 0 ..^ ( I + 1 ) ) -. A e. dom ( ( w ` j ) \ _I ) ) ) ) $.
$d A j k w $.
$d D j w x $.
$d G j k w x $.
$d I j k w x $.
$d L w x $.
$d T j w x $.
$d W j k w x $.
$d j ph $.
